Detailed Description

Private upcall socket descriptor structure.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::buf_len

Socket message buffer length.

vqec_event_t* vqec_upcall_sock_desc::ev

Upcall socket event.

int32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::fd

Socket descriptor.

boolean vqec_upcall_sock_desc::is_fd_valid

A valid socket descriptor (to differentiate fd = 0).

char* vqec_upcall_sock_desc::pak_buf

Socket message buffer (used only for packet sockets).

struct sockaddr_un vqec_upcall_sock_desc::sock

Upcall socket.

uint32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::upcall_ack_errors

Error while acknowledging / polling events.

uint32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::upcall_error_events

Error events, i.e., events that cannot be parsed.

uint32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::upcall_events

Upcall events received.

uint32_t vqec_upcall_sock_desc::upcall_lost_events

Upcall events with generation number mismatch.
